banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: Three stories of Scotland

nodes.whoTheyAre: Mackenzie Dalrymple is a proud Scot who traveled the world for many years, and now is a passionate tour guide with a few tales to tell.
nodes.whyListen: People who have participated in the tours Mackenzie Dalrymple leads up and down Scotland and have heard the tales describe him this way: "To imagine Dalrymple is to picture all of Scotland in one man. Dark-blue tartan kilt, woollen knee breeches bound with twine, silver blade tucked into the top of his hose and leather sporran lashed around his hips. He is blond and goateed, with a lilting Fife accent peppered with 'ayes.'" Driver, lecturer, raconteur and guide to all things Scottish, Dalrymple has an uncommon capacity to translate history, folklore and local color to his listeners in a manner that makes obvious his love for his country.

videoData.description: Scottish raconteur Mackenzie Dalrymple tells three spellbinding stories -- leading off with the origin of the flag of Scotland, the oldest flag in Europe.
videoData.socialDescription: Scottish raconteur Mackenzie Dalrymple tells three spellbinding stories -- leading off with the origin of the flag of Scotland, the oldest flag in Europe.
